charges.charge_description: 21:841(a)(1), (b)(1)(C); 18:2(b) DISTRIBUTION AND DISPENSING OF A CONTROLLED SUBSTANCE; CAUSING AN ACT TO BE DONE(17-19)

charges.charge_disposition: 135 months imprisonment. This term consists of 135 months on each of Counts 17,18,19, and 25, and 60 months on each of Counts 47,48, and 49 of the Indictment, all to be served concurrently. Pay $700 special assessment. All fines are waived. 3 years supervised release under terms and conditions of US Probation Office and General Order 05-02.
